additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water (78%), Reconstituted Apple Juice (16%), Reconstituted Mango Puree (5.0%), Natural Flavours (Contain Steviol Glycosides), Food Acids (Malic Acid, Ascorbic Acid), Natural Colour (Anthocyanin), Stabiliser (466).

additionalProperty.name: Dietary
additionalProperty.value: Low in Sugar, No Preservatives, No Artificial Flavours or Colours
